products.name: Wild Smoothie Bowl
products.description: Indulge in the sweet and tart flavors of our Wild Berries Smoothie Bowl, topped with fresh fruit, crunchy granola, and creamy yogurt for a healthy and delicious breakfast or snack.

products.name: Electric Orange Juice
products.description: Our Electric Orange Juice is freshly squeezed and bursting with zesty citrus flavor. Packed with vitamin C, it's the perfect pick-me-up for any time of day.

products.name: Magical Grapes
products.description: Experience the enchanting taste of our Magical Grapes - plump and juicy, with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness. A snack that's sure to delight your taste buds.

products.name: Royal Shake
products.description: Indulge in our Royal Shake - a decadent blend of rich chocolate, high-quality protein, and pure cocoa. Perfect for a post-workout boost or a guilt-free treat.

products.name: Crazy Bananas
products.description: Experience the out-of-this-world flavor of our Crazy Bananas, grown with alien technology. Sweet, creamy, and packed with nutrients, they're a snack that's truly out of this world.

products.name: Fiery Watermelons
products.description: Satisfy your cravings with our Fiery Watermelons - juicy and refreshing with a spicy kick from Tajin powder. A unique and delicious twist on a summertime favorite.
